notes.text:
This update for zziplib fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed:

- CVE-2018-6542: Reject file if the size of the central directory is too big and display an error message (bsc#1079094).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: In ZZIPlib 0.13.67, there is a bus error (when handling a disk64_trailer seek value) caused by loading of a misaligned address in the zzip_disk_findfirst function of zzip/mmapped.c.
notes.title: CVE description
